/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly in the sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from the left side of the street, looking towards the right, providing a comprehensive view of the cityscape.
